chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the issue above.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

I take the liberty of coming to you to inform you that the customer wishes to keep his item .

So it would be possible to proceed with the shipment please. 

Regards,
Kelly from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we have proceeded to cancel the order before the customer's change of request. We have fully refunded the customer, kindly inform him to make another purchase. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
JY
